column1: I am, Your Honor. Johnnie Cochran.
Mr. Cartman, do you know a boy by the name of "Token?"
Black!  Did you say black?! You called him black?!
O! He said it again!  He is African-American, and so you decided to pick him out!
The rage built and built inside your head until it became too much because you hate African-Americans!!
